about_the_game:
Join Captain Wayne in the latest upcoming demo for Captain Wayne - Vacation Desperation!

💥A BLOOD-SOAKED ONSLAUGHT; ENDLESS MODE!
🏝️3 ACTION-PACKED LEVELS THAT EXPLORE THE 7-AND-A-HALF SEAS!
💰GO FOR GOLD AND TRY FOR THE HIGH SCORE!

Play now FOR FREE as part of Steam's June 2023 NEXTFEST!

content_descriptors.notes: There is lots and lots of swearing and cursing as well as tons of blood and guts.
